text: Africa Illustrious Award is an annually and quarterly award to recognize Africans who have excelled in their field. ==History== The award is organized by My Media Africa. ==Awards== The award is an annual and quarterly event for those who excelled in leadership, philanthropy, community development, arts, and who made contributions in service industries and academia. ==2020 recipients== In 2020, The award had thirty-five categories. ==References==
title: African Illustrious Award
